thread.title: Pregnant Ciara attends Academy Award viewing party | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Pregnant Ciara attends Academy Award viewing party | Daily Mail Online

author: Leeor Samocha For Dailymail.Com
title: Pregnant Ciara attends Academy Award viewing party | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Ciara looked ecstatic to be at the 'Wonderful Crazy Night'-themed event with her handsome football star. The Texas native had her lightened locks styled into a blow out full of body with a hint of a wave towards the front. Fancy digs: The Texas native had her lightened locks styled into a blow out full of body with a hint of a wave towards the front Happy couple: Ciara looked ecstatic to be at the 'Wonderful Crazy Night'-themed event with her handsome football star Double date: The cute couple posed jovially with actor Matthew Morrison and his wife Renee Puente She accessorized simply - yet still grandly - with her massive and impressive 16-carat engagement ring. Her NFL player was dashing in a black tux, a crispy white button down and a black bow-tie. The cute couple posed jovially with actor Matthew Morrison and his wife Renee Puente. Understated glam: She accessorized simply - yet still grandly - with her massive and impressive 16-carat engagement ring Showing him off: Taking to Instagram to share a cute photo of her and her husband of nearly a year Russel, Ciara wrote: 'I'm Honored To Be An Event Chair For #EJAF25. #Oscars Less is more: She accessorized simply - yet still grandly - with her massive and impressive 16-carat engagement ring Soon-to-be parents! The expecting parents turned the goodwill evening into date night The expecting parents turned the goodwill evening into date night. Taking to Instagram to share a cute photo of her and her husband of nearly a year Russel, Ciara wrote: 'I'm Honored To Be An Event Chair For #EJAF25. #Oscars' The A-list event also saw Adriana Lima, Alessandra Ambrosio, Freida Pinto, and Angela Sarafyan in attendance. The fundraiser was catered by award-winning Chef Gordon Ramsay for the fourth year in a row. 89TH ACADEMY AWARDS NOMINEES MOTION PICTURE OF THE YEAR Arrival
